title: Iterno.eu | The Ultimate in Luxury, Durability and Style
short_description: I developed Iterno.eu, a sleek and user-friendly website for Iterno Flooring, highlighting their durable and elegant flooring solutions. Using WordPress and Bricks Builder, the site features high-quality visuals, easy navigation, and an engaging experience for visitors seeking premium flooring options.

title: Europcar | Europe's largest car rental provider
short_description: I created a clean and user-friendly website for Europcar, Europe’s largest car rental provider, using WordPress and Bricks Builder. The site offers easy navigation to explore a wide range of vehicles and rental options, tailored to meet diverse customer needs. Built with PHP, JavaScript, and CrocoBlock, the platform ensures a seamless experience for users.

title: Neoparta | Genuine spare parts
short_description: I developed Neoparta.com, a sleek and informative website for Neoparta, a leading supplier of genuine automotive spare parts. Using WordPress and Elementor, the site serves as a company profile, showcasing their history, services, and team members. The clean design and easy navigation make it simple for visitors to learn more about their expertise.

title: My Miracle Boutique | Certified 100% Mulberry silk
short_description: I built My Miracle Boutique’s eCommerce website using WordPress, Bricks Builder, and WooCommerce. The site offers unique, 100% Mulberry silk baby pillows, the first of its kind in Lithuania and Europe. The platform provides a luxurious shopping experience with intuitive navigation and seamless transactions.

title: Kavamedis | Coffee Shop Website
short_description: I created kavamedis.shop, a modern eCommerce website for an online store specializing in high-quality coffee and related products. Using WordPress, Bricks Builder, and WooCommerce, the site features an extensive catalog of coffee beans, ground coffee, capsules, and accessories. The platform ensures a user-friendly shopping experience with fast delivery options.

title: Funglandia | eShop Website
short_description: I developed Funglandia.lt, a clean and user-friendly eCommerce site for mushroom cultivation products. Built with WordPress, Elementor, and WooCommerce, the platform offers intuitive navigation and detailed product information, ensuring a seamless shopping experience for customers.

title: Jore | Real Estate Website
short_description: I created Joregroup.lt, a modern website showcasing their real estate projects with a focus on quality and client trust. Using WordPress and Bricks Builder, the site was built based on a detailed Figma design, ensuring a polished and visually appealing user experience.
